description: This Post Graduate Program in Cyber Security is designed to equip you with the skills required to become an expert in the rapidly growing field of Cyber Security. This cyber security program aims to help you stay abreast of all the latest trends in cyber security as well.
learning_outcomes: Implement security measures to protect networks and systems from threats.
Utilize SIEM tools for security monitoring and threat detection.
Analyze malware samples to understand their functionality and impact.
Understand core cybersecurity principles and practices.
Develop incident response plans to mitigate the impact of security breaches.
Apply ethical hacking techniques to identify vulnerabilities in systems.
title: Post Graduate Program in Cyber Security

description: Customized learning paths, 4x outcomes  completion rates; award-winning client support.
learning_outcomes: Conduct security audits and risk assessments
Understand cybersecurity principles and practices
Analyze malware samples and reverse engineer malicious code
Implement security controls to protect systems and data
Develop incident response plans and procedures
Apply penetration testing methodologies to identify vulnerabilities
title: Cyber Security Expert

description: Understand cyber security, types of cyber threat, and the development of an effective security policy.
learning_outcomes: Identify different types of cyber threats and their potential impact
Develop a comprehensive cyber security policy aligned with business objectives
Evaluate security controls and implement effective mitigation strategies
Understand the current cyber security landscape and emerging threats
Implement security awareness programs to educate users about cyber threats
Analyze vulnerabilities and assess risks to information systems
title: The Cyber Security Landscape

description: Understand cyber security, types of cyber threat, and the development of an effective security policy.
learning_outcomes: Evaluate security measures and propose improvements
Understand the legal and ethical considerations in cybersecurity
Understand the current cyber security landscape and its evolving threats
Apply best practices for developing and implementing effective security policies
Identify different types of cyber threats and their potential impact
Analyze vulnerabilities and assess security risks within an organization
title: The Cyber Security Landscape

description: Understand cyber security today: explore threats and the key functions of cyber security within a commercial organisation.
learning_outcomes: Apply risk management principles to cyber security
Identify key functions of cyber security in organizations
Analyze potential vulnerabilities and risks to commercial organizations
Understand the importance of security awareness training
Understand the current cyber security threat landscape
Evaluate different types of cyber threats and attacks
title: The Cyber Security Landscape

description: Protect yourself from cyber security attacks when using computers and smartphones as you learn how to identify threats.
learning_outcomes: Evaluate the effectiveness of different security measures.
Identify common cyber security threats and vulnerabilities.
Understand the risks associated with phishing and malware.
Apply secure practices for password management and data protection.
Protect personal information and privacy online.
Analyze security settings on computers and smartphones.
title: Cyber Security Awareness and Solutions

description: Examine security in the software development life cycle and discuss the legal and ethical aspects of secure systems.
learning_outcomes: Implement secure coding practices to mitigate common vulnerabilities
Develop a security-conscious approach to software design and development
Understand the key principles of security in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Evaluate the effectiveness of different security controls within the SDLC
Analyze the legal and ethical implications of secure software development
Apply threat modeling techniques to identify potential security vulnerabilities
title: How Cyber Security Affects the Software Development Life Cycle

description: Learn the essentials of cyber security and build your skills to better protect your digital information from security threats.
learning_outcomes: Identify common cyber threats and vulnerabilities
Apply security measures to protect digital information
Understand fundamental cybersecurity principles and concepts
Evaluate security risks and implement mitigation techniques
Analyze security incidents and develop response strategies
title: Introduction to Cyber Security

description: Understand cyber security, types of cyber threat, and the development of an effective security policy.
learning_outcomes: Analyze vulnerabilities in systems and networks.
Identify and classify different types of cyber threats.
Apply risk management principles to cybersecurity.
Develop an effective security policy for an organization.
Evaluate and improve existing security measures.
Understand the current cybersecurity landscape and its challenges.
title: The Cyber Security Landscape

description: Discuss the future of cyber security, emerging technologies, the challenges they pose, and the development of cyber solutions.
learning_outcomes: Apply risk management frameworks to cyber security challenges.
Evaluate the security implications of new and evolving technologies.
Develop effective incident response strategies.
Design robust security architectures to mitigate cyber risks.
Analyze emerging cyber security threats and their potential impact.
Understand and apply relevant cyber security regulations and standards.
title: The Future of Cyber Security and Emerging Technologies

description: Master the basics of investigating and preventing cyber crime attacks alongside the cyber security experts at PA consulting.
learning_outcomes: Understand the fundamentals of cybercrime investigation techniques.
Apply methods for identifying and analyzing cyber security attacks.
Analyze real-world case studies of cybercrime investigations.
Evaluate strategies for preventing future cybercrime incidents.
Understand the legal and ethical considerations in cybercrime investigation.
title: Cyber Crime Investigation

description: Help secure your organisation as you discover potential cyber security threats and the frameworks you can use to prevent them.
learning_outcomes: Understand the principles of cyber security incident response
Analyze potential cyber security vulnerabilities within an organization
Apply relevant security frameworks to prevent cyber threats
Implement security awareness training programs for employees
Evaluate the effectiveness of incident response plans
Develop effective communication strategies during a security incident
title: Cyber Security Incident Response for Managers

description: Learn to identify malware on a computer system to understand how to prevent malware attacks and enhance your cyber security.
learning_outcomes: Develop strategies for preventing malware attacks and improving cybersecurity posture.
Apply forensic tools and techniques to extract and analyze digital evidence.
Analyze malware behavior using static and dynamic analysis techniques.
Identify different types of malware and their characteristics.
Understand the principles of malware analysis and digital forensics.
Investigate compromised systems and identify the source of malware infections.
title: Introduction to Digital Forensics: Malware Analysis and Investigations

learning_outcomes: Evaluate the effectiveness of salting and key stretching in password security
Analyze the strengths and weaknesses of different hashing algorithms
Understand common password storage methods and their vulnerabilities
Apply various password cracking techniques using appropriate tools
Create and utilize rainbow tables for password recovery
Implement defenses against common password attacks
title: Advanced Cyber Security Training: Hands-On Password Attacks

description: Learn how to identify, mitigate, prevent, and recover from network attacks and understand how to increase your network security.
learning_outcomes: Identify common network attack vectors and vulnerabilities
Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to identify security weaknesses
Apply SIEM principles to monitor and manage security events
Develop and execute incident response plans for network security breaches
Implement and configure firewalls to protect network perimeters
Analyze network traffic to detect malicious activity
title: Advanced Cyber Security Training: Network Security
